definition: a device (usually metal and ornamental) attached by a hinge to a door
details:
noun
- a device (usually metal and ornamental) attached by a hinge to a door
= synonyms: doorknocker, rapper
- either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman
= synonyms: boob
- one who disparages or belittles the worth of something
= synonyms: detractor, disparager, depreciator
- a person who knocks (as seeking to gain admittance)
= example: a person who knocks (as seeking to gain admittance)
- (Yiddish) a big shot who knows it and acts that way
